meanings.definition: A strong alcoholic drink made from plums.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they passed around a bottle of slivovic.
meanings.sent2: The bartender recommended trying the homemade slivovic.
meanings.sent3: After a sip of slivovic, he started dancing like a pro.
meanings.sent4: The scent of slivovic filled the room, transporting me to a plum orchard.
meanings.sent5: The taste of slivovic lingered on my tongue long after the glass was empty.

meanings.sent1: He decided to slivovic with his friends to celebrate.
meanings.sent2: She slowly savored the slivovic, enjoying every drop.
meanings.sent3: As a dare, he attempted to slivovic the entire bottle in one go.
meanings.sent4: The music was so good, it made him want to slivovic all night long.
meanings.sent5: With a smile, she raised her glass to slivovic to new beginnings.
